org.apache.juneau.rest.client

Interface RestCallHandler

  • Deprecated. 
    Use RestCallHandler class.

    @Deprecated
public interface RestCallHandler
    Interface that allows you to override the handling of HTTP requests.

    Providing this implementation is the equivalent to overriding the RestClient.execute(HttpEntityEnclosingRequestBase) and RestClient.execute(HttpRequestBase) methods.

    This can also be accomplished by providing your own RestClientBuilder.connectionManager(org.apache.http.conn.HttpClientConnectionManager), but this provides a simpler way of handling the requests yourself.

    • RestClient.RESTCLIENT_callHandler
    • RestClientBuilder.callHandler(Class)
    • RestClientBuilder.callHandler(RestCallHandler)

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        HttpResponse execute(HttpEntityEnclosingRequestBase req)
              throws ClientProtocolException,
                     IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Execute the specified body request (e.g. POST/PUT).

        Subclasses can override this method to provide specialized handling.

        Parameters:
        req - The HTTP request.
        Returns:
        The HTTP response.
        Throws:
        IOException - Stream exception occurred.
        ClientProtocolException - Signals an error in the HTTP protocol.

      • execute

        HttpResponse execute(HttpRequestBase req)
              throws ClientProtocolException,
                     IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Execute the specified no-body request (e.g. GET/DELETE).

        Subclasses can override this method to provide specialized handling.

        Parameters:
        req - The HTTP request.
        Returns:
        The HTTP response.
        Throws:
        IOException - Stream exception occurred.
        ClientProtocolException - Signals an error in the HTTP protocol.
